metadata.description:
"In each of us, there is another whom we do not know." The shadow is the dark side of the subconscious, where this 'other' resides. It's where we've imprisoned our demons --
 where they amass inconceivable power. Unearthing and mending with the shadow is a delicate, gradual process. But sometimes all it takes is one brutally jarring experience, coupled with a reckless dose of hard drugs and booze, to plunge you straight towards the darkest pits of your psyche.
metadata.name: Eat the Shadow
